title: Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik
content: t if you are caught thieving at any point, you will face Helsik, two gilded minotaur, and six gilded imps (May be more on Tactician). If you pass a DC 10 Deception check to tell Helsik you did not get the gloves, she will state you owe her the original fee proposed (20,000 gp) to enter the House of Hope.
